rules_text:
When City Recovery Unit enters the battlefield, Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
When City Recovery Unit dies, rejuvenate 1 [i](Exile a card from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 1 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
